comments: Overall, I found Professor Croteau to be a very knowledgeable and caring instructor. She cares very much about her students as well as them getting better. She likes to storytell at times but also is very clear with how she explains the concepts being taught.

comments: Wonderful human, bad professor. She\'s super nice, genuinely cares for her students/their well being, but can\'t teach for anything. All she does is read from her PP and expects you to understand. Do the reading, the assignments and study.

comments: She is awsome. She knows what she is taking about and wants her students to be successful. She is always checking in with her students. I wish she would go teach at my transfer school!

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  LECTURE HEAVY  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: She tells way too many stories and you\'ll find yourself sitting there 80% of the time wondering why she\'s telling you about her family or life stories. She flies through the notes and does not cover material very thoroughly. But, if you do the connect assignments and study it\'s an easy A. If you take her just don\'t attend class and teach yourself.

comments: Mrs Crotaeu is a great teacher and was always willing to help me with any issues I had. The other reviews on here saying she is unorganzied or unhelpful are simply inaccurate. I will say tho her lectures are quite boring. Aside from that, great teacher!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She is one of the worst professor you could ever have. She talks about her kids so much. Do not take BIO 112 with her if you want to pass. She is okay not as a professor, but she should probably have picked a different profession.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: She does talk about her kids a lot but her stories always pertain to what she is teaching. She knows SO much about Biology and is very willing to help. study, Study, STUDY! don\'t miss a lab either!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Very helpful and understanding when it comes to the problems outside of school. do your work and the class is a breeze. was worried about bio at first but after a week all my concerns were gone!! I HIGHLY recommend her class!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: Becky was an excellent teacher. Very interested in the material she taught. Positive and humble. She really wants her students to succeed and that\'s a trait in professors that is hard to come by these days. Her tests do not stray from what she teaches you. I will be taking her again for other classes in the future.

comments: Took her class online over the summer. We had five papers and a diet analysis project to do over the summer and she didn\'t grade them until the day before grades were due, so you have no idea what your grade is until the very end. I wouldn\'t recommend taking her online since she had a tons of problems with getting things posted on blackboard.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Get ready to read (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)
comments: I have had Becky for two semesters now, and while she can be tough at times and expects a lot from students, I left her classes knowing a LOT more about the subjects than I went in with. I had previously taken BIO 111 with another prof, and I learned a lot more from Croteau. This is what you want from a good prof!

comments: She ignores a lot of questions. IT takes her SO long to even get ready for class. Im not sure if she even knows what she is talking about half the time. All she seems to want to talk about is her kids and life, umm.....I didn\'t sign up for family 101. Its sad I probably have learned more about her kids, than the actual class. BEWARE. dont take.

comments: Okay, she is completely the worst teacher EVER. She doesn\'t explain anything at all, I recommend actually reading the book, because your not going to get any useful information out of her. It takes her like 2-3 weeks just to grade a test. She doesn\'t go over things you get wrong either, just do yourself a favor, don\'t get her.

comments: She is the worst professor I have ever had. She is so completely unorganized that nothing is given back on time. I am currently in week 9 of the semester and still haven\'t received my grade for the first project we turned in during the second week of class. I will not recommend her to anyone nor have I learned a thing.
